actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for an increase in pay for members of the uniformed services in certain enlisted pay grades.
short_title: Military Career Enlisted Pay Adjustment Act of 1983

summary.text: Military Career Enlisted Pay Adjustment Act of 1983 - Increases by specified percentages the monthly basic pay of enlisted members of the uniformed services serving in pay grades E-4 through E-9.

titles.title: Military Career Enlisted Pay Adjustment Act of 1983
A bill to provide for an increase in pay for members of the uniformed services in certain enlisted pay grades.
